name: Souland
description: There are many nations in Souland, and you will be one of them. Can you beat all other nations?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher Processor: 0.5 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
